message.body:
$TSLA (-0.2% pre) Tesla’s Battery Revolution Just Reached Critical Mass - BBG

http://ooc.bz/l/9056

links.title: Tesla's Battery Revolution Just Reached Critical Mass
links.description: Tesla Motors Inc. is making a huge bet that millions of small batteries can be strung together to help kick fossil fuels off the grid. The idea is a powerful one-and has been used to help justify the company's $5 billion factory near Reno, Nev.-but batteries have so far only appeared in a handful of true, grid-scale pilot projects.

message.body: Stock Futures Fall as Trump's Immigration Ban Invites Backlash $NFLX http://dlvr.it/NF7R76

links.title: Stock futures fall as Trump's immigration ban invites backlash
links.description: Stock futures declined on Monday morning, following European markets lower, as investors grew nervous over a White House immigration ban that fueled weekend protests across the country. S&P 500 futures were down 0.3%, Dow Jones Industrial Average futures fell 0.2%, and Nasdaq futures declined 0.34%.

links.title: Yen rises, dollar weakens as Trump travel ban, unrest rattles investors
links.description: The yen advanced against its peers in holiday thinned trade on Monday, strengthening as much as 0.7% against the dollar, with risk sentiment worsening after President Donald Trump's travel ban order and ratcheting up of his protectionist stance.
